mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SP_LOGS_PRODUCT (LGCS_CODE, LGCS_NAME, PD_CODE, SCIENTIFIC_NAME, LOCAL_NAME, SALES_NAME, PD_NAME, CLASSES_CODE, CLASSES, MACHINING_CODE, MACHINING, BREED_CODE, BREED, FEATURE_CODE, FEATURE, WEIGHT_CODE, WEIGHT, GRADE_CODE, GRADE, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES
( #{item.lgcsCode}, #{item.lgcsName}, #{item.pdCode}, #{item.scientificName}, #{item.localName}, #{item.salesName}, #{item.pdName}, #{item.classesCode}, #{item.classes}, #{item.machiningCode}, #{item.machining}, #{item.breedCode}, #{item.breed}, #{item.featureCode}, #{item.feature}, #{item.weightCode}, #{item.weight}, #{item.gradeCode}, #{item.grade}, 0, #{item.crtId}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.updId}, #{item.updTime}, #{item.actId}, #{item.actTime}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT SLP.LGCS_CODE as lgcsCode, SLP.LGCS_NAME as lgcsName, SLP.PD_CODE as pdCode, SLP.SCIENTIFIC_NAME as scientificName, SLP.LOCAL_NAME as localName, SLP.SALES_NAME as salesName, SLP.PD_NAME as pdName, SLP.CLASSES_CODE as classesCode, SLP.CLASSES as classes, SLP.MACHINING_CODE as machiningCode, SLP.MACHINING as machining, SLP.BREED_CODE as breedCode, SLP.BREED as breed, SLP.FEATURE_CODE as featureCode, SLP.FEATURE as feature, SLP.WEIGHT_CODE as weightCode, SLP.WEIGHT as weight, SLP.GRADE_CODE as gradeCode, SLP.GRADE as grade, SLP.DEL_FLG as deFlg, SLP.CRT_ID as crtId, SLP.CRT_TIME as crtTime, SLP.UPD_ID as updId, SLP.UPD_TIME as updTime, SLP.ACT_ID as actId, SLP.ACT_TIME as actTime, SLP.VER as ver FROM SP_LOGS_PRODUCT SLP
